id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier for the API aggregator (lowercase, alphanumeric and hyphens only)

label.title: Label
label.description: Display name of the API aggregator

website.title: Website
website.description: Primary website URL of the API aggregator

iconUrl.title: Icon URL
iconUrl.description: URL to the company logo or icon image

developerPortalUrl.title: Developer Portal URL
developerPortalUrl.description: URL to the developer documentation or API portal

twitter.title: Twitter Handle
twitter.description: Twitter handle (without the @ symbol), or null if not available

sourceUrl.title: Source URL
sourceUrl.description: URL to an article or source with information about this aggregator

countryHQ.title: Country HQ
countryHQ.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the headquarters location

networkId.title: Network ID
networkId.description: Alternative network identifier (if different from id)

companyId.title: Company ID
companyId.description: ID of the parent company if applicable

verified.title: Verified
verified.description: Whether the API aggregator has been verified as legitimate and operational

marketFocus.title: Market Focus
marketFocus.description: Geographic region or market focus of the aggregator

live.title: Live Markets
live.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes where the service is live

upcoming.title: Upcoming Markets
upcoming.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes for upcoming launches
